cast.overview: Inspired by true events, this film takes place in Rwanda in the 1990s when more than a million Tutsis were killed in a genocide that went mostly unnoticed by the rest of the world. Hotel owner Paul Rusesabagina houses over a thousand refuges in his hotel in attempt to save their lives.
cast.title: Hotel Rwanda

cast.overview: A chronicle of Nelson Mandela's life journey from his childhood in a rural village through to his inauguration as the first democratically elected president of South Africa.
cast.title: Mandela: Long Walk to Freedom

details.biography:
Fana Mokoena is a South African actor best known locally for his lead roles in the television series Yizo Yizo, Generations and The Lab.

His biggest film role to date is the supporting role of General Bizimingu in the 2004 film Hotel Rwanda.

He has a starring role in the 10th season of the SABC1 drama series Soul City, in 2010.
details.name: Fana Mokoena
